code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='http://localhost:5002/api/products';const getAuthHeader=()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');return token?{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}:{};};export const getProducts=async()=>{const res=await axios.get(API_URL,{headers:getAuthHeader()});return res.data;};export const addProduct=async prod=>{await axios.post(API_URL,prod,{headers:getAuthHeader()});};export const updateProduct=async(id,prod)=>{await axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id),prod,{headers:getAuthHeader()});};
